TextView.android:text: In a small, forgotten town, the only train line that connects it to the outside world is about to be shut down for good. As the last train is scheduled to leave, a diverse group of passengers—each with their own reasons for traveling—find themselves on board. Among them is Elara, a young artist returning to confront her past, and Mr. Thorne, an elderly man who has lived in the town his entire life and harbors a secret that could change everything. The atmosphere is tense, filled with unspoken stories and the weight of impending change.
